wikipedia_page.main: Carol Margaret Handley (née Taylor; born 17 October 1929) was headmistress of Camden School for Girls (1971–85) and President of the Classical Association (1996-7). Handley is now a classics tutor at Wolfson College, Cambridge. Handley is known for her longstanding advocacy for Classics education in schools and universities, as well as for her work on teaching and examination materials for the Joint Association of Classical Teachers and for the University of Cambridge.
